message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a little higher than I'm comfortable with at the moment. Would you be willing to come down to $100?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
